code: import"../StyleComponenst/Header.css";import DbButton from"./DbButton.js";import MenuItem from"./Menu.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const menuSelect=()=>{let url=new URL(window.location.href),menu=url.searchParams.get("menu"),menuItens=document.querySelectorAll(".MenuItem a"),pages=["Home","ParaVoce","Preferencias","Penapolis","Regiao","Brasil"];console.log(menu);for(let i=0;i<pages.length;i++){if(menu===pages[i]||!menu){menuItens[i].classList.add("on");i=pages.length-1;}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{onLoad:menuSelect,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"logo512.png",alt:"Logo",width:"60px"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"ALT"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{link:"?menu=Home",output:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{link:"?menu=ParaVoce",output:"Para você"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{link:"?menu=Preferencias",output:"Preferências"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{link:"?menu=Penapolis",output:"Penápolis"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{link:"?menu=Regiao",output:"Região"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{link:"?menu=Brasil",output:"Brasil"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DbButton,{link1:"?menu=SingIn",output1:"Sing In",link2:"?menu=Register",output2:"Reister"})]})]});}export default Header;
